name: Sayori Shoots Up The Literature Club
storyline: Have you ever wondered what would happen if instead of committing suicide Sayori shot up the school instead?Of course you have! Lucky for you, you don't have to wait any longer because this mod offers just that. Watch as Sayori blows away the club members with her new poem, a sawed off shotgun, and prepare for a good time with a mod that finally has the 3 Gs of fun: girls, giggles, and guns.
summary: “Sayori Shoots Up The Literature Club” is a controversial mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that drastically transforms the atmosphere of the original game. Instead of the subtle psychological terror of DDLC, this mod takes a more shocking and extreme approach, presenting a narrative where Sayori, one of the main characters, takes an unexpected and violent turn against the literature club.
